data.title: all
data.name: all
data.deck: Click here to see all of the People profiles on our website.

data.title: elders
data.name: elders
data.deck: Gateway Church is led by a team of elders (elder is the Bible's name for those who give oversight and spiritual direction to the local church).

data.title: lifegroup-leaders
data.name: lifegroupLeaders
data.deck: Lifegroups form an important part of what we do as a church. Our lifegroup leaders host and lead small groups meeting regularly in homes across the city of York.

data.title: ministry-leaders
data.name: ministryLeaders
data.deck: Gateway has various ministries serving the church and the local community. Each ministry team is led by a ministry leader.

data.title: staff
data.name: staff
data.deck: The work of the church is supported by a great staff team who fulfil a range of roles varying from a few hours a week to full-time.

data.title: trustees
data.name: trustees
data.deck: Gateway Church is the working name for Gateway (York) CIO - registered charity (1165744). The trustees are legally responsible for the governance of Gateway Church.
